snippet.title: Turnabout Retribution [FT] Part 1: Kristoph Goes To Heck
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthrough]

Kristoph's No Good Very Bad Day, and his lone chance for redemption-? Or, rather, his old life back- should he manage to avoid jail time for his past crimes. Will he succeed? Will he succeed, but less evil? Will he fail spectacularly? Does something smell? Is it the Butz? Or is it hellfire and sulfur pits?

Good question! 
-----------------------------------------
Turnabout Retribution, by The Fury Wraith!

Originally made for the "A Miracle Happen" Case Competition hosted by Trybien and Spongesonic.
Now finally completed!

Warning: This case contains major spoilers for Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney (AA4) as well as certain big spoilers for the Ace Attorney Trilogy. (AA1, 2 and 3) It is recommended you play these games before playing this one.

(You're this deep into a playlist of Ace Attorney fancases though so that is a moot point)

Find it on Court Records here! http://aaonline.fr/forum/viewtopic.php?t=13513
